Review.Contenu: What a disappointment! What we were led to believe would cost $114 a month ended up being $600 a month! For a one person office that's quite ridiculous and completely unaffordable. We were also told that we would have an account manager who would be our direct contact. Very much not the case. In fact, we never heard from that person again and dealt with multiple people. A service of this type should have account managers to moniter usage and provide guidance initially.

Review.Titre: lost TENS OF THOUSANDS in calls and…
Review.Contenu: lost TENS OF THOUSANDS in calls and advertising dollars. DEAD AIR. They can not answer google calls. They can not answer Microsoft Teams phone networks. Requested immediate action to fix issues yet there was no response for 1 week.

Pure facts, no opinion1) Due to a combinations of issues I had to spend a lot of time working with support and Billing.  Fact:  Out of 83 calls to support, not once was I able to reach someone directly. I was always forwarded to to someone to take a message and have someone call me back.2) Out of several dozen test calls during the trial, not once were they able to follow the instructions on the script.  Instructions which were suggested by, and written by, Posh support after my feedback.If you are considering this service, do yourself a favor, try calling their support before you become a customer.  See how many times you end up just leaving a message.If you still go through with it, place many calls during their trial period.  See how many times things go as planned.Edit:  Our sales floor manager, also a 50% partner, signed up with his name/e-mail.  We do not wish to share additional information with POSH about our experience.

Review.Titre: I agreed to 300 a month and my bill…
Review.Contenu: I agreed to 300 a month and my bill turned out to be 1200 a month! They are nice until you question the bill and then they are not nice anymore. Messages came in incorrect. Not happy.

Review.Titre: Very unusual experience / poor customer service
Review.Contenu: I’m not the type to leave online reviews, but I felt I had to report my experience with Posh.  I give 3 stars because everything was going great with my onboarding process until we had to make an update to my call script.  I was first told the updates would take 30 minutes, then was told 24 hours, then was told to be patient, and then my multiple follow-up e-mails went unanswered.  Very unusual for this business to become unresponsive and disappear without an explanation.  I’ve since decided to start working with a different virtual receptionist service that can send messages via fax (Posh sends messages only via SMS, e-mail, and their app), which works out better anyway for my business.UPDATE:  Downgrading my review to 2 stars because Posh failed to address the issue (their unresponsiveness) in their response.  Why were they unable to deliver on their promise?

Review.Titre: It's a good service as a receptionist…
Review.Contenu: It's a good service as a receptionist but they have not provided the full service I was advised they could in my initial telephone conference.  If you just need someone to answer phones that's fine.  I've never seen any attempt to forward a call to me though and simple appointment setting is evidently outside their scope although I was told if I had an open calendar they could do that.

The receptionists are professional and extremely polite and overall the service is very good.. My only issue is that when the calls come in to your cell phone, the number that appears does not say Posh.....various numbers appear and you never really know who's calling you.
Consistent, easy to use, easy to talk to the receptionists.

Easy to set up and work with. The detailed messages let us filter out the spam / un-important phone calls and focus our efforts on the ones that needed our attention.Would love to see an easier way to configure the call flow without having to go through the support team.

Review.Titre: We do find they do a great job!
Review.Contenu: We do find they do a great job of answering our calls we miss and taking messages. However, they were acting as if they were working in the office and scheduling our patients for appointments when they were only suppose to be taking appointment requests and send us messages. I've tried to correct this with their manager, but we are still waiting for this to be corrected with all the staff who answers our calls.

Review.Titre: I am almost very happy with Posh
Review.Contenu: I am very happy with Posh. The only reason there is one star missing in my review, is because their agents are still working out the hiccups when consistently following my instructions/requests. There are a few agents who sometimes don't follow my call instructions. HOWEVER, Posh has the best customer service, hands down. Any time there is an issue, they truly seem encouraged to resolve it and get better. They are also quick to reimburse when mistakes are made. That is hard to find with a reception company. I think that if the same agents are left on my account, and they learn how I want my calls handled, this will be the best reception company out there. It all starts with customer service, so Posh is well on its way. (And to be fair, my call instructions are very specific and probably more complicated than most clients')

Review.Titre: for the most part the bumps are gone an…
Review.Contenu: for the most part the bumps are gone an occasional one arises and we report and it gets resolved. I have recommended you to many other Home Instead owners in the last year since we came on board with you.

This team is AMAZING! I've been able to have some boundaries with my business. It has really helped my mental health not having to be at my phone all of the time. I have also noticed an increase of business because of the friendly receptionists that offer info and take messages from potential clients. They were never leaving voicemails, so this has been amazing.  I've recently (the last month or so) had some trouble being able to call to turn the service on and off. Once they get this remedied fully, I would give them a 6/5 star review!! They are amazing!

Review.Titre: Posh is a amazing company to work with
Review.Contenu: Posh is a amazing company to work with. They have simplified my issues with not having a reliable receptionist. The only reason I gave them 5 stars and because of the spam calls. I constantly have to block them because it runs up my minutes.
Pretty good overall.  Forwarding calls to next in line to receive them and getting all the detail occasionally is a challenge.

Review.Titre: Some messages that come through have…
Review.Contenu: Some messages that come through have just the contact information. There is nothing about what Posh and the caller talked about.
POSH has transcended my companies ability to be there for our patients and strategic partnerships.  I highly recommend them!

They really sound like they work for your company.  Their receptionists are all native English speakers and they do a really good job of following your prompts in a common sense manner.  Customer service was very responsive as well.
Natalie has been amazing! After trying 2 other call centers we have found the one for us. Great system that works smoothly!

Review.Titre: I can finally have a weekend off and not worry about the phones
Review.Contenu: I own a company that is always getting customer calls and if we don't answer the phone, we can easily loose that client. I found this service through a colleague in the same industry that uses it. We have been using POSH now for a few months and it has been great. There has been some issues with certain people not correctly tracking the call or not getting the right information but they are very quick to get it fixed. The customer service is really good and they are always available to help. Knowing that I can actually have a day off with my family and the calls are being answered without having to hire a full-time employee is worth everything.

From the initial phone call, through the trial period, and now beyond the client on boarding process; Has been nothing but absolutely phenomenal.Kelsey was a true pleasure to work with, and was patient and answered each and every question I had.Nate was a wizard with the integration piece making sure, POSH and our CRM merged seamlessly together.I no longer have to worry about my clients getting a voicemail, which allows me to focus more on efficiently, running my business, while at the same time providing better customer experience.The entire reception team handles each and every call  With care and precision and yet somehow still managed to do it in around three minutes per call saving me the business owner money and time.To be honest, the only thing I regret is not having done this earlier in my business.Having the ability to  Scale up or down according to call volume means that adding POSH VA to your team is literally a no-brainer.

Review.Titre: POSH has been a wonderful experience so…
Review.Contenu: POSH has been a wonderful experience so far.  Easy onboarding, my instructions and scripts for calls are followed well and consistently. I can easily and quickly reach out to my account contact anytime I need anything. Truly “5 stars”!

Like most business owners today, I'm running my company from my phone. Having my calls answered professionally before either transferring the call to me or taking a message, is paramount. Every receptionist has handled calls with professionalism and all my messages have been thorough and accurate. POSH has been a great experience for me.

Being my first experience there just a few adjustments that were needed and my Sale Director was very responsive in addressing my needs. We will definitely be using this service in the future and look forward to doing so.Again thank you for a great experience!Tom W.
Very easy to work with - able to adapt services to our company's specific needs.  Support is quick responding as well.  Very much appreciate the service POSH provides us!
We've been using Posh for over a year now and they are willing to work with every one of their clients 1 on 1. Customizing work flow to fit your companies needs.

Love this service!As a small business, having a real person who speaks very well and politely answer the phone is necessary.  The receptionists do a great job.  The app is great.  I love being able to text and call through it.

I had some reservations at first because our service is based around privacy law and complete confidentiality. During the onboarding process however, I received personalised service and support and regular communications until we were completely happy to handover all of our inbound calls to Posh. Fast forward 6 months and I have no cause to complain at all. Scripts are followed professionally and the receptionists are professional enough to handle any ad hoc situations. I have used several call centre/ virtual receptionists over the last 15 years and POSH stand out for us as the best by far. The app is also convenient and easy to use.Price wise, I think it is fair. Again I wasnt really sure about the price brackets and structures but our monthly spend compares favourably with other 'similar' services and is within the range we are happy with. Keep up the great work POSH team, here is another satisfied customer.
The level of response and customer service is great!

Review.Titre: Posh has been great for my business
Review.Contenu: Posh has been great for my business! They pick up all of my inbound calls in a friendly and professional manner which is super important since they are representing my company. They offer flexibility on the fly and superb customer service every time I reach out. I hope to stay in partnership with Posh as I continue to grow!

Posh offers the best value (quality and price) among all the providers I explored. They made ramp up easy and seamless. Their service is excellent … very thorough; follows our individual algorithm precisely and consistently; the mobile app is very user friendly and provides all essential information in an easy-to-use format. Finally, their sales and support staff are professional and responsive, and their receptionists are professional, friendly, and service oriented. I recommend Posh without reservation to anyone needing a reliable, affordable remote answering service.

Review.Titre: I've been very pleased with the POSH…
Review.Contenu: I've been very pleased with the POSH service. They have been extremely helpful with support. It's so nice to know that I don't have to hire an assistant for phone service.

Game changer for improved customer communications.   I had a major obstacle to overcome with my growing business in that I could no longer keep up with phone calls, voicemails, and filter through robo callers.    I heard about Posh from another entrepreneur.   Within minutes of getting my account set up and phone line forwarded it already paid for itself.   It has made scheduling of if field jobs super efficient and allows me to focus on quality calls.    Every one of my customers say how pleasant and professional the receptionist are with Posh making a great first impression. If you have a growing small business and need help with you phones, I highly recommend.

Review.Titre: Allow us to concentrate on emergencies
Review.Contenu: So far so good! We own a domiciliary care agency. We love they way we are notified about a customer/ carer call through the Posh App. It’s great not to be woken up in the early hours by queries that could wait until office hours. Posh allow us to concentrate on proper emergencies out of hours. I recommended the service to my husband who now use them for his chauffeur business.

Review.Titre: Dropped my old phone service after trying out Posh
Review.Contenu: I just moved from another legal answering service which made me feel as if they didn't care about me or my clients. I am thrilled with the quality of Posh services. Their delivery system is easy to use. The employees at Posh are friendly and courteous to me and my clients. I can easily recommend them!

Review.Titre: Easy to use, professional and exceptional.
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use the app and customer service is exceptional. The virtual receptionists staffed with Posh are very professional and follow instructions well.
Sarina Perez specifically made my experience great!Sarina puts in the extra effort into her client’s requests making it possible for business owners to seamlessly operate.

Review.Titre: Onboarding and initial impressions of Posh
Review.Contenu: I worked closely with Kelsey Smith during the setup and onboarding process.  She was transparent, helpful, and followed up in timely professional manner.  She has been terrific to work with.  Our experience using the Posh service has been really good.  The workflows and scripting is working as planned and callers are having a good experience.  We are very pleased with our choice to trust Posh.

Review.Titre: Simple, easy courteous and I'm impressed
Review.Contenu: Our agency trusted another virtual receptionist company for years. Each year the disappointment grew to a point it was affecting our business. The over billing for spam calls, security breaches, and their technology was not up to par. We began speaking with Sarina, and the rest was history. I have received compliments on how people are impressed with our new receptionist, and you can feel the energy. You would think they are inside of your building the way they handle the calls coming to our office.

Review.Titre: Quick and Solution Focused Costumer Service
Review.Contenu: Posh has wonderful and fast costumer service.  If I ever contacted them via email, I would receive a quick response with a solution to my issue.

Great help and support.  I have only been with Posh for three months but thus far I have received exceptional customer service from everyone I have spoken with and each of my issues has been quickly addressed.  I am actually very happily surprised at this (some of their competitors warned me against joining on when I told them I was going to try their services) and to this point I am very happy with the results.  Thanks for everything and I look forward to continuing this wonderful working relationship.

Review.Titre: Treats customers with kindness and respect!
Review.Contenu: Posh gets it right every time. They treat my customers with kindness, respect and empathy. I always get the information I need - and I know that's hard to do. I have only had positive comments from callers about their experience with Posh. Our firm only has room for the best service partners - and Posh makes the cut!

We have been using the services of Posh for about 6 months and are delighted with the level of service.  The associates are uniformly courteous, well-spoken and definitely motivated to do a great job.  We have referred a number of our clients to Posh and the feedback has been terrific.

I run an apartment rental company and we use Posh to help answer our phones. They have been nothing short of fantastic! Everyone that speaks with a Posh receptionist has told us how polite and professional they are. Their service is excellent and well worth the money!

Sarina was fabulous.  From start to finish, she was responsive and provided me with all the information I needed to make my decision.  After I decided to move forward she diligently designed a custom call flow for our law firm.  This was a great experience.

Review.Titre: Great service, flexible and amazing value.
Review.Contenu: First of all, Posh is great. My situation was unique I had multiple lines of businesses each needed it’s own phone number and answering. They were able to design a custom solution to fit all of my expansive needs at a cost-effective rate. Now when you call each of my businesses they are answered 24/7 with a unique greeting per the line. Posh has completely replaced my phone system as their app is amazing and I can dial out through the app. My phone is no longer field with Spam that I can’t answer and I’m not missing important client calls. The flow is designed to my exact specification and they are very coachable if I ever want to change something. Would 10/10 recommend.
This service has been a huge asset to our clinic.  Sarina has been very responsive to all of our specific requests and pleasure to work with!

Posh has professionalized my small firm. They have been great to work with. I love their app where I can change my status from accepting calls to not accepting calls. They made the sign up process very easy. Loving the experience.

Review.Titre: I have been using Posh for over a year…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Posh for over a year now, I am very happy with the service. They are very reliable. I am really happy that we outsourced the answering service, everyone in the office can now focus on tasks, and distracted by calls.

Review.Titre: POSH services - a plus to our business!
Review.Contenu: We have been using POSH services since early 2021 and we have been pleased with their systems and staffing. Implementation was quick and seamless, and their team is communicative and responsive. We are very happy with the service.

I have been utilizing Posh for several months for my kid's transportation company. Adding Posh was the best executive decision I've made. Posh has always gone above and beyond to provide quality customer service in front as well as behind the scenes. When I ask my customer about their experience with my answering service, I've always received outstanding feedback. Posh has helped my company grow, by providing quality customer service from the beginning to the end. I couldn't imagine my company without the support they provide daily. What I love the most is, I can give Posh my ideas for my company, and they put them into motion so professionally. If you're looking to have a company, that will feel like they are part of your company, and care about your success as much as you do, Posh is the right choice. Posh, thank you for being a part of my success day in and day out.Sincerely,Gigi's World Kids Taxi LLC
Sarina has provided the best customer service, every time I’ve called in.  She is friendly, professional and wonderful to work with, and Posh is a great service provider.  Highly recommend!

I had planned on using Posh on a interim basis, and for nights and weekends.  But they were so good, that I went full time using them.  I knew I made the right decision using them, just from the compliments my customers paid them.`

Review.Titre: It has been great working with POSH!
Review.Contenu: It has been great working with POSH! They are efficient and have great communication and customer service teams. Love what they are doing and I highly recommend working with their company!

I've been through several telephone operator companies but never like Posh as we had more customized needs for how we needed phone calls answered and within our own system.  Posh truly delivers on this and just amazing the collaboration we have that we never experienced out of any telephone operator company!Special thanks to Krystal and Tristica for always working with our Admin staff and that we love the fact that we have an option to make outgoing calls from Posh too!Keep it up and would love to see improvements on the text functions (maybe automated texts we can customize and auto-send to clients)!

the companies attention to detail, and keeping call times down to a minimum.  the flexibility to change offices, times , availability  thru shared document is a game changer for sure, Natalia and her team are  5 stars

Review.Titre: I have been very pleased with POSH
Review.Contenu: I have been very pleased with POSH, they have been professional a great asset to my business. I have a psychiatric office and they handle the calls with care. I have had patients compliment me on my receptionist.
Posh service is outstanding! Anna Christofides, Programming Specialist went above and beyond what was asked. I cannot recommend Posh enough!Thank you!
It’s wonderful to have someone taking our calls and making appointments for us. This service has been a lifesaver for my small business.
We love Posh! It's a reliable and convenient service that allows us to focus on other important areas of our business. Thank you to the Posh team!

Review.Titre: I was shopping around for a service…
Review.Contenu: I was shopping around for a service provider to expand the communications options for my client and couldn't be happier to have found Posh. My rep Liana is wonderfully helpful and the plans are straight forward and simple to understand. Would definitely reccommend.

Absolutely great service for me and my small business! POSH always responds quickly to my concerns and the phone app is VERY convenient. I'm glad I found them and I hope to grow with them as the business grows too. Thanks!

Review.Titre: I've only been with Posh for a brief…
Review.Contenu: I've only been with Posh for a brief moment, however, the service, promptness of messages, and professionalism are second to none.  I would recommend Posh to others.

Review.Titre: I found Posh via an online search for answering service
Review.Contenu: I found Posh via an online search for virtual assistants and answering services who offer Spanish/English (bilingual) services at an affordable rate. I tried the 7 days FREE trial and then did not move forward until I realized I was either (a) not returning calls from potential clients or (b) spending too much trying to remember who I called or didn't...than 2 weeks later I hired Posh. My experience has been phenomenal! They answer my calls 24/7 and accommodate my Spanish speaking clients. They send me emails or texts via their portal or my preferred method. I can task them outbound calls to schedule appointments, make appointment reminder calls, and/or for something completely out of the ordinary like scheduling a reservation or other appointment for me. They'll even communicate with me after a request is completed or to provide the status on it. I can accept calls when I am able to and when I am unable to the Posh receptionist will appropriately schedule a client or route it based on my personalized protocols. I researched tons of places- virtual and local- and Posh offered the best service for the best affordability. Posh has made Key Rose, LLC more efficient and smoothly run!
Solid service. Very responsive and professional. They deliver us messages promptly so we can follow up quick and keep our customers happy.
The level of service provided by Posh allows me to relax, knowing our clients are being handled with care.
The POSH team is great, polished and has great systems to really become an extension of our customer support and ticket team for both everyday use and times when we are flooded with inquiry.

Love them so far. I really needed a new phone service quickly when my last company changed their programming. In two days total, I was not only enrolled with them but they were also servicing my clients well. Their app is great and my sales rep Pamela rocks!! She was so understanding when I told her I needed this service to start quickly because my former service changed its system. All team members of Posh have been very helpful to me as well!! I have called and used their app to make changes to my account and everything was a breeze. So nice!! I do wish they had one more option for monthly minutes on the phone in their packaging because it jumps in price from one of their packages to the next pretty steep, especially for a small business. My eyes bugged out a little when I saw the price jump, but that would be my only thing. Overall, their service is really what shines and I appreciate that very much. Thanks!

I couldn't be happier with my experience with this company. They are all so elegant, communicative, professional and eager to please. One of the hardest things about owning a business is staffing. Making sure your staff is an extension of you, your vision and represents the high standard of customer service is beyond challenging, so when you find that it's fantastic and deserves praise. I've had other "answering services" and this is much more than that. These ladies are very responsive and communicative and very good at what they do. They are organized and most important, they care about your business and they want to get it right. My account rep really helped me through this process with tweaking things in a very customized way as to fit my needs as a small business and a business with wonderful, but incredibly demanding clients. I highly recommend them if you need a higher level of customer service to help when your front desk isn't available or to use after hours etc. They are also fantastic as a virtual receptionist and so good that your clients/patients aren't even aware that they aren't sitting at your clinic or office in person... and that's a huge compliment to them. I not only get alerts with detailed information, I can actually call someone back from my personal cell phone and the customer doesn't see my personal number, they see the name of my business. They've thought of everything....its pretty amazing. Great service, great business model. Highly recommend.
Very professional. Helpful and willing to change things along the way as you find what works and what doesnt.

POSH has been instrumental in the transition to our firm's new 50-50 model: work-from-home/work-in-office model.  No matter where we are as attorneys, POSH is there "back at the office" answering our calls, and professionally delivering our clients, and prospective clients friendly and informative reception service. Each call is memorialized in a written message delivered right to each attorney via the POSH App. And lastly, their pricing is not only highly competitive, but cost effective compared to hiring additional employees.

Review.Titre: Posh has been a great system to add to…
Review.Contenu: Posh has been a great system to add to our company The portal is easy to use and the customer service is great!
Always very friendly and professional operators, and the messages they took for me were right on the money!

When we set out to close the gaps with our inbound calls we came across several different services to help us, interviewed them, internally deliberated on the experiences and value presented, and came out with the clear takeaway that Posh offered us the flawless balance of value and quality assurance that cured our anxiety of allowing an outside vendor to join in representing our brand in one of the most critical ways.  Posh was able to design an inbound call rule set that perfectly matched what we needed, and immediately began proving their value by never dropping the ball.  6 months into it, not a single ball dropped, not a single complaint, and nobody not even our highest-end billionaire clients have so much as mentioned us having an answering service helping us.  I couldn't possibly be more enthusiastic about Posh and you are making the best decision for your goals by working with them.

Review.Titre: Posh has made my life so much easier
Review.Contenu: Posh has made my life so much easier! The The calls were set up within a few hours and everything has been a breeze. Nathalia has been my main contact and she helped me so much
Professional, seamless, service that has been provided for my business!

Review.Titre: One of the best investments I've made…
Review.Contenu: One of the best investments I've made with the business. I highly recommend Posh!

Review.Titre: Thanks for your help today getting my…
Review.Contenu: Thanks for your help today getting my google voice forwarding on track
I had no issues, setup was simple, receptionist were bilingual English/Spanish perfect for my customer base.
The POSH team is great! They have been a great asset to our business. They are like an extension of our CS team.

Review.Titre: I have had two clients recently tell me how professional and kind the phone attendant was and I want you guys to know how much that is appreciated!!!
Review.Contenu: Experience over all has been great!

Review.Titre: They do a great job super professional…
Review.Contenu: They do a great job super professional and polite.
Excellent job answering calls and communicating with our clients.
I've tried literally 10 virtual receptionist companies and Posh handles call the best.
Very convenient.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: Life changing for my solo practice!
Review.Contenu: Life changing for my solo practice! Thank you!
You guys are always professional and my last experience was no exception.

Review.Titre: Excellent service. My experience with the staff is great.
Review.Contenu: Excellent service.
Superb and efficient service. We highly recommend Posh Virtual Receptionists.
